SELECT USERID , CASE WHEN (USERSTATUS = 'U' || USERSTATUS = 'S') THEN '활동' WHEN USERSTATUS = 'D' THEN '탈퇴' WHEN USERSTATUS = 'C' THEN '휴면' END AS USERSTATUS , GRADE , USERNAME , GENDER , DATE_FORMAT(JOINDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOINDATE , DATE_FORMAT(LASTCONNECTDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LASTCONNECTDATE , DATE_FORMAT(BIRTHDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BIRTHDATE , CALLNUMBER , PHONENUMBER , EMAILADDRESS , DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(LASTCONNECTDATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AS DORMANTACCOUNTDATE FROM YS_USER U WHERE 1 = 1
AND (USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR USERID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR PHONENUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR EMAILADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND ISRECEIVEEMAIL = 'Y'
AND ISRECEIVEEMAIL = 'N'
AND ISRECEIVESMS = 'Y'
AND ISRECEIVESMS = 'N'

SELECT USERID , USERNAME , BIRTHDATE , CALLNUMBER , PHONENUMBER , EMAILADDRESS , JOINDATE , GENDER , LASTCONNECTDATE , ISRECEIVEEMAIL , ISRECEIVESMS , USERSTATUS , SECESSIONDATE FROM YS_USER Y WHERE Y.USERID = #{userId};

-- 11개월간 미접속자 사용자 리스트(활동 -> 휴면전환) SELECT U.USERID , U.USERNAME , U.GENDER , U.LASTCONNECTDATE , U.BIRTHDATE , U.PHONENUMBER , U.EMAILADDRESS , U.ISRECEIVEEMAIL , U.ISRECEIVESMS , U.USERSTATUS , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(U.LASTCONNECTDATE, INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AS FIRST_SCHEDULDATE -- 1차 처리예정 안내일 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(U.LASTCONNECTDATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS SECOND_SCHEDULDATE -- 2차 처리예정 안내일 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(U.LASTCONNECTDATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS THIRD_SCHEDULDATE -- 3차 처리완료 안내일 FROM YS_USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND U.USERSTATUS = 'U' -- 휴면 : C / 탈퇴 : D / 활동 : U AND U.LASTCONNECTDATE < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d');

-- 휴면계정인 상태로 2년 경과시(미접속 3년 경과, 휴면 -> 탈퇴전환) SELECT U.USERID , U.USERNAME , U.GENDER , U.LASTCONNECTDATE , U.BIRTHDATE , U.PHONENUMBER , U.EMAILADDRESS , U.ISRECEIVEEMAIL , U.ISRECEIVESMS , U.USERSTATUS , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(U.LASTCONNECTDATE, INTERVAL 35 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') AS FIRST_SCHEDULDATE -- 1차 처리예정 안내일 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(U.LASTCONNECTDATE, INTERVAL 3 YEAR), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS SECOND_SCHEDULDATE -- 2차 처리예정 안내일 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(U.LASTCONNECTDATE, INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS THIRD_SCHEDULDATE -- 3차 처리완료 안내일 FROM YS_USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND U.USERSTATUS = 'C' -- 휴면 : C / 탈퇴 : D / 활동 : U AND U.LASTCONNECTDATE < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 35 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d');
